description: In this story James Deen is a Driver for hire. He is hired for a very special delivery. Josie Jagger is in a duffel bag in the trunk of his car. When he finds her, she is taken to a safe house and tied up. James Deen than throat fucks her hard and deep. He than ties Josie to the bed and fucks her wet pussy until she submits completely.
title: The Courier2
